name: PACCAR Inc
summary: PACCAR Inc is a global leader in the design, manufacture, and customer support of premium light-, medium-, and heavy-duty trucks under the Kenworth, Peterbilt, and DAF nameplates. The company also manufactures advanced diesel engines, provides financial services, and distributes truck parts worldwide. Headquartered in Bellevue, Washington, PACCAR operates in over 100 countries and is recognized for its innovation and environmental responsibility.
